body.name: WiFi Camera Indoor Security Camera 2K 5GHz & 2.4GHz Security Camera Cameras for Baby/Elder/Dog/Pet Camera with Phone app Smartphone
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 28 mins
features: This smart infrared security camera features a 4MP HD color night vision. It offers higher definition and clearer night vision compared with 1080P competitors and a 50-feet visibility in low light or total darkness.
This dual band (5GHz/2.4GHz) wireless security camera comes with a simple app and a 64GB memory card for easy use and installation.
The camera can detect objects in motion and track them automatically.
Additionally, with the two-way audio and alarm system, users can communicate with family, pets and visitors and warn off any unwanted visitors via microphone and speaker.
We offer 30-day free cloud storage and great after-sales service. If you encounter any problems on the product, please feel free to contact our 24/7 after-sales customer service.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.1 4.1 out of 5 stars 142 ratings 4.1 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just what I was looking for.Easy to connect & viewWorks great with my wifiIt’s small and fits anywhereGreat quality videos and recordingsMotion detection works very wellLike that I can rotate it and move it around to view the whole roomNight version is perfectSaves videos without having to pay which is super nice! Great price too!I have nothing bad to say about this camera. It’s the best I have had and I have tried a few that have always had connections issues to wifi.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: The camera is unobtrusive, was easy to set up, and allows us to monitor my MIL when she stays with us and we are not in the house. She is largely limited in mobility and being able to check in on her, and even "with" her using the intercom feature, gives us peace of mind. The app is easy to use and we have it installed on multiple phones. For the money, you won't find a better value than this camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and impressive
reviews.reviewText: Installation was sooooo easy and the quality of the camera image and video footage is very impressive! I like the fact that it has a memory card and you do not have to subscribe to the cloud if you don’t need to save videos for long periods. Definitely a good buy at a great price point!🥰

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works as advertised. Sharp picture. Easy installation and setup.Wish it came with a small piece of double sided mounting tape. Handy tight spots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Support for this camera sucks!
reviews.reviewText: Initially the camera worked great. Then after a month I could no longer delete video from the TF card and so the camera would no longer record. So I tried to reset the camera and now it will not bind so it no longer works. I can't get a hold of anyone by email for support with the camera. Don't buy this product you are wasting your money if you do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE THESE CAMERAS
reviews.reviewText: I BOUGHT 2 CAMERAS BEFORE GOING AWAY TO MEXICO SO I COULD KEEP AN EYE ON MY ELDERLY MOM AND HER CAREGIVERS TO ENSURE ALL WAS WELL. I HAVE ONE SET IN LIVING ROOM FACING HER CHAIR AND ONE IN BEDROOM. GOOD THING I DID! WHEN THEY WERE ASLEEP SHE WAS FALLING OUT OF HER BED AND HER FEET WERE DANGLING AND MY CAMERA ALERTED ME SO THAT I COULD CALL THE CARE GIVER. THESE CAMERAS ARE AWESOME. SO EASY TO USE AND THEY WORK SO WELL AND I CAN CHECK ON PAST HISTORY AS WELL

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The cameras themselves are of good quality and the picture is good. The night vision has a very limited area but that's not a problem. The problem is the app, specifically the recording settings, and motion/person detection. I have tried every setting available on the app and still end up with 30-40 alerts a night with no movement in the video. I can't set it to record at specific times or turn the camera off with the app. I tried to reach out to customer support but received no response. I think the app needs to be more user friendly when it comes to the settings. Other than that it's okay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: Was fairly easy to set up. Nice thing is it connects to 5GHz wifi network which is great! I also really liked the 64gb sd card that came as well, you plug that into the bottom of the camera which makes it a little more discreet. I opted to use that instead of paying for the cloud subscription. The SD card has been recording non stop for the past 13 days. Today is July 25th and I can go all the way back to the day I first set it up which was July 13th.when viewing playback, it will split everything into 5 minute intervals. So you will need to click like a 5 minute recording, and it starts playing but if you need to fast forward, you have to wait a little bit for it to load that far *then it will allow you to fast forward further. Take a look at my screenshot for how that's set up and visually looks.Camera quality is pretty nice and clear. I also attached a sccreenshot of how the night vision mode looks.Voice wise - I havent tested it much. Also haven't utilized the motion detection as well. the interface of the application is pretty simple to use.
